definition: easy/amiable/to change/to exchange/prefix corresponding to the English adjective suffix "-able" or "-ible"
surname Yi/abbr. for 易經|易经[Yi4 jing1], the Book of Changes
to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join
to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Our trad agreement with Britain will expire at the end of this year.
sentences.chinese: 我们与英国的贸易协定将在今年年底终止。

sentences.english: But no U.S.-Taiwan free trade agreement is pending.
sentences.chinese: 但是，美台签自由贸易协定还遥遥无期。

sentences.english: Oman and Bahrain have free trade agreements with the United States.
sentences.chinese: 阿曼和巴林与美国签订了自由贸易协定。

sentences.english: South Korea recently sealed an FTA with the European Union.
sentences.chinese: 韩国近期完成了与欧盟之间的自由贸易协定。

sentences.english: We are making overtures to the authorities for a free-trade agreement.
sentences.chinese: 我们正在向当局建议签订一项自由贸易协定。

sentences.english: However, it is quite clear that RTAs are discriminatory.
sentences.chinese: 但是，区域贸易协定具有歧视性是不用争辩的事实。

sentences.english: TRADE deals are often concluded at the eleventh hour.
sentences.chinese: 贸易协定谈判通常行百里者半九十。

sentences.english: It was the Reciprocal Trade Agreements Program.
sentences.chinese: 《互惠贸易协定法》是多因素的产物。

sentences.english: They soon tore up the trade agreement.
sentences.chinese: 他们不久就撕毁了贸易协定。

sentences.english: All trade agreements with China need to be reviewed and re-thought.
sentences.chinese: 所有与中国的贸易协定都需要检讨和重新评估。

sentences.english: The impact of the new trade agreement will take time to play out.
sentences.chinese: 这个新贸易协定的作用尚需时间来实现。

sentences.english: Withdrawal from a Plurilateral Trade Agreement shall be governed by the provisions of that Agreement .
sentences.chinese: 一诸边贸易协定的退出应按该协定的规定执行。

sentences.english: South Korean protester holds a picket at a rally to protest free trade agreement talks in Seoul March 9, 2006.
sentences.chinese: 南韩抗议者举牌抗议在首尔举行的自由贸易协定会谈。

sentences.english: Portman is optimistic that the trade agreements will move forward soon.
sentences.chinese: 波特曼对于贸易协定很快得以推进感到乐观。

sentences.english: They are making overtures to the authorities for a free-trade agreement.
sentences.chinese: 他们正向有关当局建议签订一项自由贸易协定。

sentences.english: Analysts believe the E.U. could stop negotiations, launched earlier in the summer, over a package of trade agreements between Europe and Russia.
sentences.chinese: 分析家认为欧盟可能停止谈判欧俄贸易协定。

pinyin: mao4 yi4 bao3 hu4 zhu3 yi4
Shi4 jie4 Mao4 yi4 Zu3 zhi1

definition: to withdraw from the European Union/abbr. for 脫離歐盟|脱离欧盟
